SweepCast observed: $AVGO with Unusual Options Activity Alerted on $580 CALL Expiring: 06-17-2022 worth 26K🐂  Check out Premium Room or SweepCast.com

$AVGO this is a stock where you should've definitely already been in calls if you wanted to play earnings. This stock already always has high premium because it moves 11$ in a day 3-4x a week. That's big money to be made if you play it right. 

If You're just getting in now, don't  buy premium directly. Use debit spreads on either calls or puts. If you pay premium straight up, you can get IV crushed. 

A lot of the earnings have opened flat afterwards and then slowly moved towards the direction of the earnings results  

Avgo will have a good ER but the price action ain't always gonna follow the ER results

If I had a 5k account, and I wanted to play this, id probably do calls on $SOXL because AVGO is the biggest holding there. 

Then I'd do a debit spread of 610 to 625

Risk to get 450 get 2500.

Best Buy $BBY higher by about 5% on earnings. Options  were pricing twice that move at around 10%. Prior two earnings saw moves of -12% and +8%.

👉 $AOSL : AOSL stock rose 4.6% to 53.39, moving off its 50-day line. Shares of the power-management-chip maker have a 59.48 entry. But investors could use a move above Tuesday's high of 55.73 + 10 cents as an early entry.

👉 $AVGO : AVGO stock rose 2.75% to 585.78. Shares of the wireless-chip maker and software maker need to get above the 50-day line, with 614.74 a possible early entry. The official buy point for AVGO stock is 677.86. Broadcom earnings are due Thursday night.

👉 $BBY : BestBuy reports Q4 2021 earnings ahead of Thursday’s opening bell, with analysts looking for a profit of $2.77 per-share on $16.7 billion in revenue. If met, earnings-per-share (EPS) will mark a 20% profit decline compared to the same quarter last year.  The stock fell more than 12% in November despite beating Q3 estimates and raising fiscal year 2022 guidance.

👉 Micron Technology ($MU) and Rambus ($RMBS) flashed early buy signals, while Axcelis Technologies ($ACLS) is on the verge of doing so. Other chip plays close to being actionable include Alpha & Omega Semiconductor ($AOSL) and Broadcom ($AVGO), which reports earnings late Thursday
